column3: I play football, and most football players are camera shy. We just want to be left alone; we just want to stick to what we do.
I only work once or twice a year for about a month, so I have a lot of free time. But I'm good at being alone, which helps.
Rick Owens is my desert island designer. I could live in his clothes alone, and I collect Ossie Clark.

I've always loved the rush you get from watching a really scary movie, but I never watch them alone. It's fun to turn out the lights and scream and clutch someone's hand and spill the popcorn all over the place and hide under each other.

I wasn't the most prodigiously talented cricketer in Karnataka, let alone India. Some of my team-mates in my school team could hit the ball cleaner than I do. I had to work through that lack of talent, so to speak, that lack of natural flair. Runs never came easy for me.

I don't think I could compare myself to Macaulay Culkin, because we're pretty much two different kinds of actors. He's done a lot of comedy. He does mostly just comedy like 'Uncle Buck' and 'Home Alone' and 'Home Alone 2.' And I've done a lot of different stuff, like sad movies, like the movie about the kid with AIDS.

The job of a composer is putting something down on a piece of paper that will inspire the person who's playing.

I became so discouraged that I decided to write something that would please me alone - that became my sole criterion. And that was when I wrote 'Forgetting Elena,' the first novel I got published.
Adultery is the ultimate deal-breaker for me. I would rather be alone than in a relationship that doesn't honor me.
